name: Devil Sword
Rapier
desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units.

name: Shamshir
desc: For Myrmidon-line and Thief-line units only. Adds SPD/2 to Mt.

name: Light Brand
desc:
Calculated as Light Magic damage at range.
Grants Mag +3 when equipped.

name: Flamberge
desc: Calculated as Anima Magic damage at range.

name: Wind Sword
desc:
Calculated as Anima Magic damage at range.
Effective against fliers. Allows 2 consecutive hits.

name: Runesword
desc:
Calculated as Dark Magic damage at range.
Drains HP from enemy.

name: Susano'o
desc: Uses Mag to determine damage at range. Effective against fliers.

name: Medea's Tooth
desc: Medea bloodline only. Res +5. Effective against dragons.

name: Spy's Dagger
desc: Matthew only. Effective against units afflicted with negative status effects. Grants Def/Res +3 on self and inflicts Def/Res -3 on target for one turn after combat.

name: Devil Lance
Fueg's Beak
desc: Fueg bloodline only. Uses Mag to determine damage at range. Str/Mag +3.

name: Devil Axe
Swordslayer
desc: Reverses the weapon triangle. Effective against sword fighters

name: Wyrmfang Axe
desc: Ryuuji only. Reverses the weapon triangle.

name: Devil Bow
Ballistae
desc: Fire a ballista. Uses refresh per chapter.

name: Ballista
desc:
Ballisticians only.
Uses recover after each chapter.

name: Killer Ballis
desc:
Ballisticians only.
Uses recover after each chapter.

name: Long Ballista
desc:
Ballisticians only.
Uses recover after each chapter.

name: Folia's Horn
desc: Folia bloodline only. Restores (User's Mag + 10) HP. Target regains 10% Max HP per turn for 5 turns.

name: Soothe
desc: Restores an ally's HP from afar. Infantry classes only.
components: Restores an ally's HP from afar.

name: Physic
desc: Restores an ally's HP from afar.

name: Fortify
desc:
Restores (User's Mag + 10) HP to all allies within range.
(Not affected by Prayer.)
components: Restores HP to all allies within range.

name: Torch
desc:
Lights an area. The light lasts for 5 turns.
(Not affected by Prayer.)

name: Silence
desc: Enemy is rendered unable to use magic.
components: target.wexp['Light'] or target.wexp['Anima'] or target.wexp['Dark'] or target.wexp['Staff']

name: Stun
desc: Enemy cannot move or attack for one turn.

name: Trade
desc:
Trade items with a distant allied unit.
(Not affected by Prayer.)
components: Trade items with a distant allied unit.

name: Hammerne
desc:
Repair an item to full uses.
(Not affected by Prayer.)
components: Repair an item to full uses.

name: Rescue
desc:
Bring an ally to a space adjacent to the user.
(Not affected by Prayer.)
components: Bring an ally to a space adjacent to the user.

name: Warp
desc:
Move an ally to another square.
(Not affected by Prayer.)
components: Move an ally to another square.

name: Apollo
desc:
Restores HP and condition of all allied units.
(Not affected by Prayer.)
components: Restores HP and condition of all allied units.

name: Amaterasu
desc:
Merin bloodline only. Revives one dead unit and places them on the chosen tile.
(Cannot be repaired.)

name: Blárblade
desc: Trevor only. Heals half damage dealt. (Stacks with <icon>Skills 7, 32</> White Lightning).

name: Wind
desc: Allow two consecutive hits. Effective against flying units.

name: Elwind
desc: Allow two consecutive hits. Effective against flying units.

name: Excalibur
desc:
Speed +5. Allow two consecutive hits.
Effective against flying units.

name: Nosferatu
desc: User recovers HP equal to damage dealt.

name: Bite
desc: Use a vicious bite attack. Uses refresh per chapter.

name: Poison Vial
desc:
Inflicts target and target's adjacent allies with <red>Poisoned</>.
(Range = 2 thru Skl/2)
components: Inflicts target and target's adjacent allies with <red>Poisoned</>.

name: Lockpick
desc: Opens chests and doors. Uses refresh per chapter.

name: Torch
desc: Increases user's sight range in fog of war

name: Angelic Robe
desc: Permanently raises maximum HP by 7 points.

name: Sake
desc: Permanently raises Resistance by 4 points and decreases Skill and Speed by 2 points.

name: Rainbow tonic
desc: Permanently raises all of the user's stats except HP, CON, and MOV by 1.

name: Wyvern Whip
desc:
Ervan's old whip.
Promotes Krista from Great Lord.

name: Old Rock
desc: An old rock. Nothing special about it.

name: Shiny Gem
desc: A gem that shines in the sunlight.

name: Oreg's Scroll
desc: Permanently raises all of the user's growth rates except CON by 10%.

name: Wing Shield
desc: Negates effective bonus of bows and wind magic toward user.

name: Great Shield
desc: User is immune to critical attacks.

name: Merin's Shell
desc: User is immune to critical attacks. If of Merin's bloodline, also reduces damage taken by 5.

name: Gold Card
desc: "If found, please return to Anna and Jake."

name: Light Rune
desc: A useful item that creates a single-space magical barrier through which no one can pass.

name: Mine
desc: A trap that damages units that step on it.

name: Worn Book
desc:
A book that Krista loaned to Ervan.
(Cannot be removed from unit's inventory.)

name: Repair Kit
desc:
Repair an item to full uses. Usable once per chapter.
Merchants and Maids only.
components: Repair an item to full uses.

name: Range Ring
desc: Range +1 to all of the user's weapons and staves.

name: Pass Ring
desc: Allows unit to move through enemy units when held.

name: Steal+
desc: Steal items from enemies including unequipped weapons.

name: <white>Refresh</>
desc: An adjacent unit can move again.

name: <white>Refresh</>
desc: Adjacent units can move again and gain +2 to all stats except HP and Mov.

name: <white>Refresh</>
desc: Adjacent units can move again and gain Mov +1.

name: Shove
desc: If unit's CON + 2 > ally's CON, move ally one space away from unit.

name: <white>Reposition</>
desc: If unit's CON + 2 > ally's CON, move ally one space away from unit.

name: <white>Rally</>
desc: Grant Def +3 to all adjacent allies for 1 turn.

name: <white>Rally</>
desc: Grant Str +3 to all adjacent allies for 1 turn.

name: Sacrifice
desc: Unit gives 5 of their own HP to an ally.

name: LunaCalc
desc: Uses the lower of Def/Res when calculating damage

name: Summon
desc: Summons a phantom in exchange for 1000G and an optional weapon from the unit's inventory. The phantom will wield the chosen weapon (or an Iron Axe if none chosen) and will be the same level as the unit. Only one phantom can be summoned at a time.
components: Summon a phantom in exchange for gold.
game.get_money() >= 1000 and (not u('Phantom') or game.check_dead('Phantom') == True)

name: LightOverride
desc: (Lets the Light Brand count as Light magic damage at range.)

name: AnimaOverride
desc: (Lets the Flamberge, Wind Sword, and Susano'o count as Anima magic damage at range.)

name: DarkOverride
desc: (Lets the Rune Sword count as Dark magic damage at range.)
